PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_SwitchingDeviceTypeContactor
PropertySetDef.Definition: An electrical device used to control the flow of power in a circuit on or off.

PropertyDef.Name: ContactorType
PropertyDef.Definition: A list of the available types of contactor from which that required may be selected where:\X\0D \X\0D CapacitorSwitching: for switching 3 phase single or multi-step capacitor banks.\X\0D LowCurrent: requires the use of low resistance contacts.\X\0D MagneticLatching: enables the contactor to remain in the on position when the coil is no longer energized.\X\0D MechanicalLatching: requires that the contactor is mechanically retained in the on position.\X\0D Modular: are totally enclosed and self contained.\X\0D Reversing: has a double set of contactors that are prewired.\X\0D Standard: is a generic device that controls the flow of power in a circuit on or off.
